H0.text: Usually made of plastic, which transparent instrument, in the shape of a triangle with one angle at ninety degrees, is used for drawing angles on paper. Protractor

H1.text: Usually made of plastic, which transparent instrument, in the shape of a triangle with one angle at ninety degrees, is used for drawing angles on paper. Triangle Ruler

H2.text: Usually made of plastic, which transparent instrument, in the shape of a triangle with one angle at ninety degrees, is used for drawing angles on paper. Angle Gauge

H3.text: Usually made of plastic, which transparent instrument, in the shape of a triangle with one angle at ninety degrees, is used for drawing angles on paper. SET-SQUARE

A4.text: A protractor is a measuring instrument, typically made of transparent plastic, for measuring angles.

A5.text: A bevel protractor is a graduated circular protractor with one pivoted arm; used for measuring or marking off angles.

A6.text: A goniometer is a device used to measure angles.
